column2: You just Can’t Get Enough Of these guys, can you?
column3: 你永远不会厌倦这些家伙，对吧？

column2: Suppose you have to play these maps...

column3: 周末工坊兄贵赛获胜者
保存在本地的未发布地图

column2: THE PINNACLE OF TERRORIST GYMING TECHNOLOGY

column3: 更为致命的军团根据地

column2: THE PINNACLE OF UNDEAD GYMING TECHNOLOGY
THE WEAK SPOT DEEP IN THE INFESTED CAVES

Broforce, before you go, I want to
introduce you to someone...
column3:
兄贵军团，在你出发前，我想介绍你认识一
个人……

column2: Hello, friend. I must ask one last thing of you.
column3: 你好，朋友。我要问你最后一件事。

column2:
The Earth is now free of terrorism, 
and finally at peace.
column3: 恐怖主义的威胁已消失，地球终于获得了和平。

column2:
An American fast food restaurant is on every
Street corner, and American is spoken everywhere --
column3: 美式快餐馆开满了大街小巷，而且全世界都在学美国话——
——就连英国人的话也越来越美国化。

column2: There is nothing left to do here for a soldier.
column3: 这里已经没有战士的事情了。

column2: Come with me, and live in peace...
column3: 跟我来，回归平静的生活吧……

column2: Ah, Broforce. You have done the impossible.
column3: 厉害了，兄贵军团。你们完成了不可能的任务。

column2:
You have brought liberty, and justice,
and peace to the world.
column3: 你们把自由、正义以及和平带给了世界。

column2:
After all you have done, I have but one 
more request. High five me, Bro!
column3: 我还有个请求，就是跟我来次击掌，兄贵！

column2:
World leaders have voted unanimously
to elect you grand emperor of the world!
column3: 各国首脑都一致同意推举你们为世界之王！

column2: Gentlemen, a ceremony held in your honor awaits!
column3: 绅士们，为你们举行的典礼正等着你们呢！

column2:
How did you know that was a lizardman imposter!?
Thanks all the same!
column3:
你怎么知道那是冒牌蜥蜴人！？
总之谢谢你了！
将恐怖主义带向新高度

column2: THE CULMINATION OF BOTH TERROR AND ALIEN THREATS
column3: 恐怖主义和外星威胁的顶点

column2: You Were Kicked From The Game
A network error occurred. You got disconnected.
column3: 网络出现错误。你断开了网络。

column3: 邀请你加入游戏的网络已经失去连接。

column3: 由于你控制器的原因，系统无法找到有效玩家。

column2: Have you got non english characters in your PC name? This can cause an issue with the server
column3: 你的网名是否含有非英文字？这会导致服务器出问题。

column2: You must update the application to use network features.
column3: 你必须升级应用才能使用网络功能。

There was a problem with the"PlayStation 4" system session that you were invited to.
VERSION MISMATCH. THIS PLAYER HAS A NEWER BUILD.
column3: 版本不匹配。这名玩家用的是较新的版本。

column2: VERSION MISMATCH. THIS PLAYER HAS AN OLDER BUILD.
column3: 版本不匹配。这名玩家用的是较老的版本。

column3: 会话已不存在，无法加入。

column2: PLAYERS CAN ALSO DROP IN DURING THE GAME
column3: 玩家也能在游戏中途加入

column2: PRESS [ENTER] OR GAMEPAD [BACK] BUTTON TO CHAT
column3: 按下『ENTER』或手柄上的『BACK』键进行对话

This game saves data automatically at certain points.

the following icon is displayed on screen.

column3: 你现在正在旁观，可以放松双手了。

Failed to join game session due to parental control settings.
column3: 由于家长控制的设定，你无法加入游戏会话。

column3: 跳跃（可设为与上键相同）：{0}

column2: PLAY THROUGH ALL THE LEVELS WITHOUT BEING BURDENED BY OUR OVERBEARING NARRATIVE!
column3: 直至通关都可以不用忍受我们傲慢的解说员！

column2: HARD IS BRUTAL! WE RECOMMEND YOU TRY PLAYING ON NORMAL FIRST!
column3: 困难即残酷！我们推荐你先尝试普通难度！

column2:
IRONBRO ON HARD IS NOT EVEN REMOTELY FAIR AND WAS NOT DESIGNED TO BE BEATABLE.
PLAY AT YOUR OWN RISK!
column3:
硬汉+困难模式就是耍赖皮，它就不是按照可以通关的标准来设计的。
要玩的话后果自负！

column2: EACH BRO CAN ONLY DIE ONCE! LOSE ALL BROS AND YOU LOSE! SINGLE PLAYER ONLY
column3: 每位兄贵只能死一次！死光了你就输了！仅限单人模式

column2: You need to unlock more bros to unlock IRONBRO Mode!
column3: 你需要解锁更多的兄贵来开启硬汉模式！

column2: UNLOCK ONE MORE BRO TO UNLOCK IRONBRO MODE!
column3: 只需解锁多一名兄贵就能开启硬汉模式！

column2: CAUTION, AREAS HAVE BEEN LIBERATED THAT YOU HAVE YET TO VISIT
column3: 注意，你还没去过的区域已经被解放了

column3: 游戏进度将会丢失。你确定吗？

平局！为兄贵赛做好准备！

救 援 后 可 以

column2: This is the Amazone. Extraterrestrial extremists have been sighted in the deep forests! Terrestrialize them!
column3: 这里是亚马戎。据目击情报称森林深处有外星极端分子出没！将他们化为地球的尘土吧！

column2: This is a <COLOR=#990000>Covert Operation</COLOR>. A lone bro must <COLOR=#ff6c00>recapture</COLOR> the supply drops that have fallen into terrorist hands.
column3: 这是一次<COLOR=#990000>隐秘行动</COLOR>。一名孤胆兄贵必须<COLOR=#ff6c00>夺回</COLOR>落入恐怖分子之手的空投补给品。

column2: This is a <COLOR=#990000>Covert Operation</COLOR>. A lone bro must <COLOR=#ff6c00>survive</COLOR> the terrorist bombardment and <COLOR=#ff6c00>assassinate</COLOR> their leader.
column3: 这是一次<COLOR=#990000>隐秘行动</COLOR>。一名孤胆兄贵必须在恐怖分子的轰炸中<COLOR=#ff6c00>存活</COLOR>下来并<COLOR=#ff6c00>暗杀</COLOR>他们的头领。

column2: This is Cambodium - soon to be CamBROdium. Get to work!
column3: 这里是简谱寨——很快就会变为兄贵寨。开工了！

column2: The mysterious land of Afreeka has reported sightings of extra-terrestrial illegal aliens. Freedominate them!
column3: 据目击情报称在绯洲的神秘大陆上有非法外星人存在。解决他们！

column2: This is a <COLOR=#990000>Covert Operation</COLOR>. A lone bro must use agility to <COLOR=#ff6c00>penetrate</COLOR> the terrorist defences and <COLOR=#ff6c00>assassinate</COLOR> their leader.
column3: 这是一次<COLOR=#990000>隐秘行动</COLOR>。一名孤胆兄贵必须凭借灵活的身手<COLOR=#ff6c00>潜入</COLOR>恐怖分子的防御工事并<COLOR=#ff6c00>暗杀</COLOR>他们的首领。

column2: This is a <COLOR=#990000>Covert Operation</COLOR>. Ellen Ripbro is deep in alien territory, on a mission to <COLOR=#ff6c00>purge</COLOR> the alien hive.
column3: 这是一次<COLOR=#990000>隐秘行动</COLOR>。EllenRipbro正深入外星人腹地，执行一项<COLOR=#ff6c00>肃清</COLOR>外星蜂巢的任务。

column2: This is Hawaii. Aliens have invaded here on American borders! De-alienate them!
column3: 这里是夏威夷。外星人已经从美国边界入侵了这里！ 剿灭他们吧！

column2: This is The United States of America. Strange reports of demons and massive evil have flooded in. Humanize them!
column3: 这里是美利坚合众国。据奇怪的报告称恶魔和大量邪恶势力已经涌入。用人性感化他们吧！

column2: The people from this country look, speak and act differently to us. Let's move fast, Bros!
column3: 这里的人长相、说话和行为都和我们不一样。快出发吧，兄贵！

column2: No time to explain! You know what to do, Broforce!
column3: 没时间解释了！你知道该怎么做的，兄贵军团！

column2: This is Arstotzka. Sources claim that it is, in fact, a country. Let's move out!
column3: 这里是阿什托兹卡。有消息称它是实际存在的国家。我们出发吧！

column2: This is <color=#900>Irakistan</color> - and they said we wouldn't be able to find it on a map!
column3: 这里是<color=#900>伊拉克斯坦</color>——他们宣称我们无法从地图上找到他们！

column2: This is a <COLOR=#990000>Covert Operation</COLOR>. MacBrover is deep in enemy territory, on a mission to <COLOR=#ff6c00>actually murder</COLOR> the terrorist leader.
column3: 这是一次<COLOR=#990000>隐秘行动</COLOR>。MacBrover正深入敌人腹地，执行一项<COLOR=#ff6c00>确实谋杀</COLOR>恐怖分子头领的任务。

column2: This is a <COLOR=#990000>Covert Operation</COLOR>. A lone bro must <COLOR=#ff6c00>appropriate</COLOR> the terrorist's own weaponry and <COLOR=#ff6c00>assassinate</COLOR> their leader.
column3: 这是一次<COLOR=#990000>隐秘行动</COLOR>。一名孤胆兄贵必须<COLOR=#ff6c00>盗取</COLOR>恐怖分子的专属武器并<COLOR=#ff6c00>暗杀</COLOR>他们的首领。

column2: Something something bipartisan something something unilateral military intervention. Let's go!
column3: 就是两党合作、单边军事介入等这样那样的事。我们出发吧！

column2: This is Val Verde. Time to stabilize the region with our overwhelming firepower! GO GO GO!
column3: 这里是巴尔韦德。动用我们强大的火力稳定这一区域吧！冲冲冲！

column2: Unconfirmed reports of WMD's in Jalpin have necessitated a pre-emptive strike. Keep on your toes, Broforce!
column3: 据未确认的报告称黑律宾藏有大规模杀伤性武器，我们要先发制人。保持警惕，兄贵军团！

column2: This country really, really hates liberty. Probably. Show them why they are wrong!
column3: 这个国家是真的真的很讨厌自由。也许吧。告诉他们为何是错的！

column2: This is a <COLOR=#990000>Covert Operation</COLOR>. Time Bro is deep in enemy territory, on a mission to <COLOR=#ff6c00>assassinate</COLOR> the terrorist leader.
column3: 这是一次<COLOR=#990000>隐蔽行动</COLOR>。Time Bro正深入敌人腹地，执行一项 <COLOR=#ff6c00>暗杀</COLOR>恐怖分子头领的任务。

column2: Youkraine? More like our kraine! Claim it for freeeeeedom!
column3: 汝克兰？现在是吾克兰了！ 为自自自自自自由占领它！

column2: POWs have been stranded in Veetman for 25 years now. Find them and save them!
column3: 战俘已经被囚在月南25年了。找到并解救他们！

column2: This is the White House, 'Murica! Time to party on taxpayer dollars!
column3: 这里是白宫，美国佬！是时候用纳税人的钱办场派对了！

column2: SELECT FROM DEATHMATCH AND RACE CAMPAIGNS YOU HAVE SAVED LOCALLY
column3: 从保存在本地的死斗和竞速战役中选择
